mapper.select: SELECT c.contents_id ,c.user_id ,u.user_name ,c.category_code ,c.title ,c.created_date ,c.main_img FROM CONTENTS c JOIN USER u ON c.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND IS_ENABLE = 'Y' AND CATEGORY_CODE = #{category_code}

SELECT c.contents_id ,c.user_id ,u.user_name ,c.category_code ,c.title ,c.contents ,c.is_enable ,c.created_date ,c.main_img FROM CONTENTS c JOIN USER u ON c.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND IS_ENABLE = 'Y' AND CONTENTS_ID = #{contents_id}
